reviews.title: It does not work
reviews.comment: I doesn\'t work on Acer iconia tab android 4.1. I spend over 500 to get the box and lig TV but can only watch it on the TV. Not on tablet. Please fix the issue. Also if I am logged in on the tablet It says my account is used on another device on the TV box. You should be able to watch it on the TV and on your mobile device at the same time.
reviews.author: Omer Aci

reviews.title: Samsung note 10.1
reviews.comment: After using the older version & upgrading to this version its 100x better.  however,  it seems it has some issues with freezing even when I have great wifi coverage.  I would rate excellent if it didn\'t freeze up.  Also stop giving us euro channels, I wanna watch football not tv series lol. Thanks for adding alot more channels & getting rid of PiP addition  because that was a waste. Please update for DVR to be in HD not only SD, don\'t like that. Otherwise great app. I use the samsung hdmi out from my note to watch on the tv. PLEASE UPDATE THE WEB VERSION FOR PC!!!!! ESPECIALLY CHROME OR CHROMEBOOK USERS!!!!! THANKS  Whats with the 2-3 mins of good video & then lagging & shutting off DIGITURK!!!?????  I couldn\'t understand what the pop up message said at first, but now I guess it said log out off the program & restart the system. It has solved my issues of lagging an Whats with the 2-3 mins of good video & then lagging & shutting off DIGITURK!!!?????  I couldn\'t understand what the pop up message said at first, but now I guess it said log out off the program & restart the system. It has solved my issues of lagging and random shutting off.  I can watch Fenerbahce in peace now.
reviews.author: Phil B

reviews.title: It works on Jelly Bean!

reviews.title: NEVER WORKS
reviews.comment: This app never works in android system, why? Because you get hdmi av (audio video) cable and  connect to TV, so you watch on the tv, Digiturk doesnt want that and no control of this, so just screw the app, Digiturk has got a control with iphone, app works iphone, but no connection with tv, axuliary cable doesnt work to TV, cause has a control of that!!!!
reviews.author: Sam Green

reviews.title: Not working on Nexus 7 (Android 4.1.2)
reviews.comment: This app barfs on Nexus 7 running Android 4.1.2 complaining about the lack of Flash 10. The poorly designed, poorly written, and poorly supported software was \"bearable\" when it was working, but it\'s just a waste of resources (and subscription fees) when it doesn\'t even work anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to be taken off
reviews.comment: This app is busted and has been. Even when working, you only get ligtv channel and not the rest which people pay. This has been broken for almost a year. Since there seems no further improvements or upgrades, they should pull this off the store. Also if this is how bad their mobile app is, I couldn\'t imaging how bad the box would be. Ps ios app only had ligtv as well, no further channels.
reviews.author: Erhan Ozbay
